Issue.creator: senthil1
Issue.summary: Make statedb validator to use bulkOptimization (for couchDB) to preload committed version of read set
Issue.description: Before validating each transaction in a block, statedb validator collects read set of all transactions in the block and preload the committed version of each key in the read sets into a cache. Then, the validator compares version of key in read set against committed version in cache while validating a transaction. This reduces the number of REST API calls between peer and CouchDB during validation to improve performance.
